about_the_game:
Synopsis.
A mysterious bride-to-be arrives at your secluded suburban mansion and asks for your advice, citing her inadequacies. As the hours pass, her heart begins to change...

About the game
FellaTrain is a unique sexuality simulation set in a pleasant and beautiful mansion, where you collect points to unlock more situations and props.

Game features
Simple interface with mouse and keyboard controls.
Features an auto-mode for those who just want to enjoy the experience.
The more efficiently you play, the more customizations you can equip.
You can continue playing even after clearing all points.


Let's force her to train her skills and move on to the next level.



Shake the mouse up and down to start giving her a blowjob. Be careful, it can be difficult if the girl is choking.



If you perform the training diligently, a new custom menu will open.


※Support for English, Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, Portuguese, Indonesian, Turkish, French, Russian, German, Italian, Polish, Ukrainian, Arabic
※Play using only the WASD (directional) and ESC keys on your keyboard and the mouse.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content related to bondage and oral fetishes. Consider whether it's compatible with your sexual orientation.

name: FellaTrain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 2500 / AMD FX-8340 (2 core 4thread 以上)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gtx760 / Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6500 / ryzen 3 3200g (4 core 8thread 以上)
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gtx950 / Radeon R9 370x
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Simulation for adults practicing mature activitie. J-Eroge that's simple to play and easy to enjoy.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, French, Italian, German, Russian, Arabic, Ukrainian, Indonesian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
